presets.name: 4:2:0 General purpose, 8bit projects (Recommended if you are not sure)
presets.description: by iAvoe, require x265 v3.5+69 or higher since new parameters are introduced. Check mcstf, hist-scenecut, api implementation. Removed PPS related parameters for better media player compatibility

presets.name: 4:2:0 General purpose, 10bit projects (Recommended)
presets.description: by iAvoe, require x265 v3.5 since some parameter names are changed; or new parameters added/deleted

presets.name: 4:2:0 <40000kbps Lossless, 10bit projects
presets.description: by iAvoe, If clip is going more than 40000kbps, adjust 'b' to higher rates.

presets.name: 4:4:4 <40000kbps Lossless, 10bit projects
presets.description: by iAvoe, If clip is going more than 40000kbps, adjust 'b' to higher rates

presets.name: 4:2:0 Film high compression, 8bit projects (Very slow)
presets.description: by iAvoe. early-skip removed, added mcstf, hist-scenecut, raised aq-mode, added qp-adaptation-range, removed PPS related parameters

presets.name: 4:4:4 Film & high compression, 10bit (Suspecting Premiere compatibility issue)
4:2:0 Anime & <30fps Projects, 10bit projects (Very slow)
presets.description: by iAvoe. Removed analyze-src-pics, added mcstf, hist-scenecut, raised aq-mode, added qp-adaptation-range, removed PPS related parameters, increased bframes and bias to use more b-frames. lowered subme. Note: --subme <24fps=3, 48fps=4, 60fps=5, 100fps=6>, increased rdpenalty, lowered deblock, added tskip

presets.name: 4:2:0 Anime BDRip Coldwar, 10bit projects (HEDT w/ >=16cores)
presets.description: by iAvoe, should produce higher bitrate, slower but higher quality for very complex scenes than Anime. Added on top of Anime preset with less crf, more agressive rate control, and parrallel motion estimation (pme)
